screens.name: SplashScreen
screens.description: Minimal logo animation with app name and tagline 'Fast • Secure • Reliable'.

screens.name: Onboarding
screens.description: 3-slide carousel explaining: (1) Fast transfers, (2) Secure encryption, (3) Peer-to-peer sharing. Modern illustrations and 'Get Started' button.

screens.name: LoginScreen
screens.description: Options for Sign in with Email, Google, Apple. Clean design with one primary button.

screens.name: HomeScreen
screens.description: Simple dashboard with two main actions: 'Send File' and 'Receive File'. Show recent transfers list with status (Completed, Pending).

screens.name: SendFileScreen
screens.description: File picker with drag-and-drop area. Shows selected file name, size, and compression toggle (on/off). Progress bar for sending.

screens.name: ReceiveFileScreen
screens.description: Enter sender’s code/email to connect. Once connected, show file details (name, size) and progress bar for receiving.

screens.name: TransferProgressScreen
screens.description: Large progress circle showing % complete, speed (MB/s), time remaining. Display 'encrypted & secure' badge.

screens.name: TransferSuccessScreen
screens.description: Confetti animation with message 'Transfer Complete!'. Buttons: 'Open File', 'Share Again', 'Go Home'.

screens.name: ProfileScreen
screens.description: Shows user profile, email, settings for chunk size, encryption toggle, app theme (light/dark mode).

screens.name: SettingsScreen
screens.description: Advanced options: Change chunk size, toggle compression, clear cache, security preferences.

uiElements.buttons: Rounded corners, primary solid fill for actions, secondary outline for cancel.
uiElements.inputs: Minimal with clear labels and placeholders.

extraFeatures: QR Code option for quick connect between sender and receiver
